name: christmas tree
notes:
free version of pattern viewable at: https://www.sweetsofties.com/2025/11/no-sew-christmas-tree.html 

this no-sew christmas tree is a fun crochet pattern featuring a tall fir tree with a tree skirt. it is crocheted seamlessly in one piece, making it a relaxing project to work up without having to do any sewing. this mini tree is the perfect desk topper and decor for the winter holidays. it doubles up as a pincushion; inserted sewing pins will look like tiny ornaments! this crochet tree looks beautiful as-is in its natural state, but is also fun to decorate with mini accessories (e.g., bows, beads and buttons for ornaments, glittery pipe cleaner or eyelash yarn for a garland, and a dusting of glitter or powder for a snowy or frosted look). a truly lovely product to sell at fall and winter craft fairs and markets! 

**size**
height: 4 inches 

**materials**
medium weight 4 yarn in desired colors (i used hobbii’s tea time christmas yarn)
2.75mm crochet hook 
fiberfill stuffing
scissors 
optional: decorations such as mini bows, beads, buttons, eyelash yarn or glittery pipecleaners, glitter, white powder, etc.

**level**
★★★☆☆ intermediate. requires familiarity with stitches used (below) and changing yarn colors.

**stitches used (us terms)**
fo = fasten off
yo = yarn over
ch = chain
sl st = slip stitch
sc = single crochet
inc = increase (insert 2 sc in same st)
dec = decrease (sc 2 sts together)
hdc = half double crochet
dc = double crochet
blo = back loops only
flo = front loops only
